template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Event Management package!

This suite of applications is designed specifically for businesses in the events industry; whether you're organizing corporate retreats, outdoor team-buildings, workshops & seminars or sports challenges. Odoo brings together everything you need to manage your business in one place: from receiving client requests and sending attractive quotations, to scheduling staff, handling logistics, and invoicing clients.

By using this solution, you‚Äôll gain access to essential tools like CRM, Sales, Projects, Rentals, Planning, and more. These apps work seamlessly together to streamline your operations, save time, and improve coordination across your entire team.
Focus on delivering unforgettable events while Odoo takes care of the behind-the-scenes tasks.üé§
You can access every installed App in your Odoo database on your main dashboard.

li.p: Capture leads directly from your website and track them in CRM, where you can follow up, plan meetings, and qualify opportunities.
Send attractive proposals and service offers using Sales.
Organize your network of venues, suppliers, and partners with detailed profiles in Contacts.
Turn confirmed bookings into structured event plans with Project.
Set up and manage event registrations, tickets, and attendee lists using the Events app
Manage logistics and equipment rentals smoothly with Rental and Inventory, ensuring item availability.
Ensure all event equipment stays in top condition by scheduling repairs and maintenance using the Maintenance app.
Use Planning to assign staff for each event and publish new job offers through Recruitment.
Keep your team aligned with shared calendars using Calendar.
Create and send invoices quickly from Invoicing.
Collect digital signatures on quotes or agreements with Sign for faster client approval.

div.p: Using down payments for Event Booking:

li.p: When generating an invoice from the quotation, you can request a down payment, either as a fixed amount or a percentage of the total (e.g., ‚Ç¨1000 upfront to secure the venue and catering services).

Final Payment: After the event is completed, invoice the client for the remaining balance, which can include additional services or time tracked (e.g., extra hours, added logistics, or last-minute requests).

template.p: Coordinate stock, rentals, repairs, and availability for your event inventory

li.p: Go to the Inventory app.
Use the search bar or filters to check availability of items like tents, chairs, tables, lighting, and decorations.
Review stock levels and locations (e.g., ‚ÄúRoom 2 ‚Äì Shelf 3‚Äù) to know where items are stored.
Use Rental to:
Create a new rental order.
Add the required items from your inventory (e.g., 100 folding chairs, 2 large tents, 10 round tables).
Define the Rental Period by setting the pickup/delivery date and the return date.
Assign the rental to the corresponding event/project to keep things traceable.
Validate the rental to lock in the reservation and prevent double-booking.
Before the event, inspect rented items:
If any equipment requires attention (e.g., a torn tent or broken table), create a Maintenance Order via the Maintenance app.
Assign it to your technician, explain the problem, set the deadline, and track the status until the item is marked as ready.

template.p: Request quotes, compare prices, and manage supplier orders efficiently.

li.p: Create a Request for Quotation (RFQ) and add alternative products or vendors to compare prices and options.
When you choose the best quote, Odoo cancels the other quotes automatically.
Confirm the RFQ to make a Purchase Order (PO) you can track and invoice.
Add a delivery address like the event venue if the supplier ships there.
Use Purchase Agreements to set fixed prices and terms with suppliers for regular items like chairs or lighting kits. This makes ordering faster and easier.

template.h3: Manage your agenda with the calendar app
template.p: Stay organized by tracking all meetings, deadlines, reminders, and internal tasks using the Calendar app.

li.p: Open the Calendar app.

Schedule client meetings, vendor calls, deadlines, or event reminders by clicking on an empty time slot.
Example: ‚ÄúSet up tent for TechCorp team building in Namur.‚Äù
Check team members‚Äô availability by selecting their calendars to coordinate meetings efficiently.

template.p: Synchronizing external calendars: If event managers use tools like Google Calendar or Outlook, follow these steps to sync them with Odoo:

li.p: Navigate to Settings > Calendar > Sync External Calendar.
Link each user‚Äôs external calendar to the Odoo Calendar app.

template.p: This ensures that appointments made outside of Odoo automatically appear in the Odoo calendar.
